name: Kingston Plumbing & Heating
review1: Excellent service. Nik installed a new boiler and cylinder for us in the loft. Very professional and efficient with seamless coordination of sub-contractors.
review2: Impressed with his knowledge and the quality of his workmanship. Would definitely recommend Nik.
review3: Clean and tidy, the work was complete within the timeframe and to a high degree.

name: HW Heating
review1: I found an issue with my bathroom plumbing and they were round my house in less than 15 minutes. I really cannot recommend them enough!
review2: Very polite, friendly, clean and tidy. He was also very thorough in checking everything was still working as it should.
review3: Very professional service and reasonable price.

name: H G Plumbing and Heating Services
review1: Harry from HG Plumbing replaced our entire heating system. His attention to detail really showed in the final result.
review2: Superb service from Harry at very reasonable rate. Highly professional, engaging and tidy, no mess.
review3: We called Harry at 9am to a leaky pipe. He arrived at 9.30 and fixed it. Cannot ask for better than that!

name: MacAulay Plumbing
review1: Robert responded very quickly and was able to fit me in the following day. His skill, professionalism and work ethic was superb.
review2: He was reliable, honest, professional and I cannot fault his workmanship. No more leaks!
review3: Very professional and reliable, highly recommended.

name: A.M.K. Boiler Service and Repair
review1: Mark fixed the problem very quickly after I called with the emergency. Mark not only is a reliable plumber but also puts himself out to help in emergency situations.
review2: He is friendly, trustworthy and does an excellent job. I would not hesitate to recommend him to anyone.
review3: He diagnosed and fixed a long term issue that other plumbers had failed to rectify. This meant we finally had a nice warm house!

name: Panda Gas Services
review1: Nathan was very efficient. He explained everything clearly and helped me to choose the right product.
review2: Nathan installed our boiler 7-8 years ago and has serviced it every year since. We have always found him to be reliable, professional, friendly and helpful.
review3: Their work is top quality with competitive pricing. I have no hesitation in recommending them.

name: DM Gas And Heating LTD
review1: Danny provided a quote on the same day, and completed all work the following week. Very clean, tidy and prompt. Danny has provided an A-Class service throughout.
review2: Danny got in touch within minutes and came round the following morning. He did a fantastic job remedying all the issues.
review3: They worked cheerfully and efficiently throughout the installation. They left us with clean and tidy work areas.

name: JML Plumbing & Heating
review1: James carried out the work at short notice and with no fuss. He did it to a high standard and at an affordable price.
review2: He was beyond kind and took the time to make sure my family and I could be warm tonight. Seeing as I only called him at 5pm, I cannot tell you how impressed I am.
review3: James is a very knowledgeable polite and straight talking young man. Forever grateful.

name: Pompey Plumb Ltd
review1: Matt understood the problem, educated me on what needed to be done and then came back to fit a new tap. Kind, attentive with transparent pricing.
review2: Matthew sorted a leak under the sink today, he was friendly and resolved the issue super quickly.
review3: Excellent service. Good communication. Helpful, polite. Reasonable charge.

name: RMWS Plumbing & Heating
review1: Rob has completed several jobs for us, all to a very high standard. He is efficient, punctual, very polite, friendly and reliable.
review2: Rob was quick to diagnose and rectify the plumbing problem. Tidy worker and cleaned up afterwards. Sensible prices too.
review3: Rob was the highest rated on a local google search. He was in and out within the hour, leak fixed and even taught me how to use our boiler correctly.
